name: findmyfurryfriend
description: Find My Furry Friend is a social application designed to alert others in your area that your pet has gotten away. It will send a message via SMS or through the app depending on your choice of set up. This messages will include things like your pets name, a picture, and how friendly they might be. It is designed to get the news out quickly and have others searching for your best friend ensuring they come back safe and sound.
author: Logan A. Smith
